entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
